description: Erection of single storey outbuilding at end of rear garden (following the demolition of the existing garage)
decision_conditions: The proposed extension and alterations are not considered to fall within the parameters of  permitted development as set out under schedule 2, Part 1, Class E.1 (e) (ii) of the Town and County Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015.Which states:E.1 Development is not permitted by Class E if -(e) the height of the building, enclosure or container would exceed -  (ii) 2.5 metres in the case of a building, enclosure or container within 2 metres of the boundary of the curtilage of the dwellinghouse,

In dealing with the application the Council has implemented the requirement in the National Planning Policy Framework to work with the applicant in a positive and proactive way.  We have made available detailed advice in the form or our statutory policies in the Core Strategy, Supplementary Planning Documents, Planning Briefs and other informal written guidance, as well as offering a full pre-application advice service, in order to ensure that the applicant has been given every opportunity to submit an application which is likely to be considered favourably.

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise due to COVID19 lockdown. Photos provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Minor health and safety works in order to manage large trees with fungal decay, managing thier decline and preventing them from becoming hazardous.Recommendation:Approve.

Conditions.1. (B1) Clarify the use/occupancy of the front section of the first floor. The current lobby and rear escape stair are shown hatched blue, are any changes proposed to this area?2. (B1) Show on the plans the fire detectors, escape lighting luminaires, exit signage and provide details of door ironmongery to the rear exit door. NB escape is required without the use of a key.Informatives.1. Consultation is to take place with London Fire Brigade, any additional comments will follow.2. The over boarding of the asbestos ceiling is noted. Please note that all works must be carried out in accordance with the Control of Asbestos Regulations 2012.
